response.original_title: In The Night Garden... Hello Igglepiggle!
response.overview: In The Night Garden... is a thoroughly modern interpretation of a nursery rhyme picture book, and takes children on an imaginative journey to meet a host of wonderfully silly characters, like Igglepiggle, living together within a happy and caring community. It is both funny and reassuring, with a capacity to relax and entertain.  This DVD contains the episodes: Igglepiggle's blanket in Makka Pakka's Ditch, Jumping for Everybody, Igglepiggle's Mucky Patch, The Pinky Ponk Adventure, Igglepiggle's blanket walks about by itself.
response.title: In The Night Garden... Hello Igglepiggle!
